dcterms:description: An open-access collection of 5000 exams from two hospitals in Vietnam (2018-2020), selected 1000 exams with two MLO view mammograms from both breasts, totaling 2000 images, classified based on PNL criteria.
dcterms:title: VinDr Mammography dataset
